c3c54368-375f-4b34-b161-ae7dc2d19df7.description: Earners of the globally-recognized Resource Management Certified Professional (RMCP)® program have demonstrated their mastery of resource and workforce management concepts, best practices and techniques applicable to most project-based work in a services entity. Individuals earning certification have demonstrated the ability to help service-based delivery functions more predictably improve resource management results via application of better process design and supporting technology enablement.
c3c54368-375f-4b34-b161-ae7dc2d19df7.name: Resource Management Certified Professional (RMCP)®

alignments.name: Just-in-Time Resourcing®
alignments.description: The certification teaches Just-in-Time Resourcing® (JITR), a process solution incorporating the RMI’s Global Resource Management methodology for achieving efficient planning, sourcing, development and deployment of human capital for project-based work in a services business. JITR is the preeminent global standard for resource management.

badge_template_activities.title: Must meet minimum experience criteria as defined in the RMCP® Handbook.
Complete pre-requisite reading material prior to attending a certification program. See the RMCP® Handbook for more information.

Attend Certification Program - Either Three day on-site program, including interactive class sessions and practical exercises; Six online, instructor led sessions, practical case study exercises, weekly sessions run approximately two hours; or Pre-recorded, on-demand sessions and practical case study exercises. Certification exam conducted at conclusion of program.
RMCP® certification is valid for two years. To keep the certification status active, retake the certification exam and get certified or earn 20 Professional Certification Units in 2 years.

811690b6-0e72-4894-9a77-6b10ecebd504.description: This training course is for earners of the globally-recognized Resource Management Certified Professional (RMCP)® certification. The training leverages Just-In-Time Resourcing® and the foundational resource management competencies developed during the certification program. Individuals completing this training receive next-level development toward increasing the strategic focus and improving business outcomes from the Resource Management Office and resource management processes.
811690b6-0e72-4894-9a77-6b10ecebd504.name: Advanced Resource Management

alignments.name: Just-in-Time Resourcing®
alignments.description: The training leverages Just-in-Time Resourcing® (JITR), a process solution incorporating the RMI’s Global Resource Management methodology for achieving efficient planning, sourcing, development and deployment of human capital for project-based work in a services business. JITR is the preeminent global standard for resource management.

badge_template_activities.title: Must complete Resource Management Certified Professional (RMCP)® Program - Either Three day on-site program, including interactive class sessions and practical exercises; Six online, instructor led sessions, practical case study exercises, weekly sessions run approximately two hours; or Pre-recorded, on-demand sessions and practical case study exercises. Certification exam conducted at conclusion of program.

Must attend four, instructor led, online sessions. Online training sessions run approximately two hours and focus on increasing the strategic focus of the Resource Management Office, improving business outcomes from resource management processes, and increasing strategic partnering across the organization to achieve company-wide goals.

241f8327-c546-44eb-8ccf-b8e0c2db9703.description: Efficient Resource Management leads to improved project performance, improved utilization of human capital, better customer satisfaction for internal and external customers, reduced employee attrition, and reduced time management involved in staffing issues. This training course is designed to provide foundational competency development for professionals new to resource management that work in organizations that focus on project-based work.
241f8327-c546-44eb-8ccf-b8e0c2db9703.name: Fundamentals of Resource Management

alignments.name: Just-in-Time Resourcing®
alignments.description: The training leverages Just-in-Time Resourcing® (JITR), a process solution incorporating the RMI’s Global Resource Management methodology for achieving efficient planning, sourcing, development and deployment of human capital for project-based work in a services business. JITR is the preeminent global standard for resource management.

badge_template_activities.title: Must attend three hours of on-demand training. The training focuses on the foundational concepts of resource management and how it supports the organization, the fundamentals of characterizing resource supply and demand through skills management, processing staffing requests, and forecasting future demand.
